snippet: A large new government study has found that the lung function of marijuana smokers is impaired only after the equivalent of a joint a day for 10 years.
abstract: A large new government study has found that the lung function of marijuana smokers is impaired only after the equivalent of a joint a day for 10 years.
lead_paragraph: A large new government study has found that smoking marijuana on a regular basis, even over several years, does not impair lung function.

headline.main: Moderate Marijuana Use Does Not Impair Lung Function, Study Finds
